name: Pixel Knight - Reforged & Restarted
description:
Remade and Reformed pixel knight to fit a better theme for the models along with many bug fixes to the original game. From the remake, the code has been tweaked along with gameplay in order for a smoother experience compared to the original. 

Week 1 - I chose my project to work on that being pixel knight my original game

Week 2 / 3- I decided upon a theme of the game for something that would better fit my game with assets I had already included

Week 4/5/6 - Replacing and Editing Assets in the game to match the chosen theme of sandy desert

Week 7/8 - Fixes to the collision of firebar, attack animation, and lava traps

9 - Bug fixes involving attack for both player, enemies and fixes enemies animation file having them walk backward and teleport instead of walk toward the player

10 - Changes to the instructions screen and main menu
